name: Helix Jump Ball-Spiral Tower
description:
Helix Tower is a new addictive hard game that will keep you playing for hours nonstop! Your main objective is to slide to the right and left to move the helix and let the ball bounce and land only on the black platform.

★★ These are some features that will let you love to download and install Helix Tower on your smartphone or tablet instead of other bouncing games ★★

✓ We designed an awesome environment and graphics especially for Helix Tower and you will not be able to find them elsewhere.

✓ Very easy to play but very hard to master! Anyone can start playing easily because it doesn’t require any special skills.

✓ Our ball bounce game is free, and you can start and keep playing the most addictive brain teasing game without paying anything.

✓ Endless! Yes, our game is endless, and you can enjoy playing as much as you want because the only one who can stop you is you. You can also take the challenges mode to complete different missions.
